data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Jerry lives near few of his family members. Only ____ father ____ in ____ same ____ as ____. Before, many ____ his ____ lived ____, ____ they ____ to ____ parts ____ the ____. He misses them, and wishes they stayed closer.
data.partBlankContent: Jerry lives near few of his family members. Only h__ father li___ in t__ same to__ as h__. Before, many o_ his sis____ lived nea___, b__ they mo___ to diff_____ parts o_ the cou____. He misses them, and wishes they stayed closer.
data.fullContent: Jerry lives near few of his family members. Only his father lives in the same town as him. Before, many of his sisters lived nearby, but they moved to different parts of the country. He misses them, and wishes they stayed closer.
data.answer: 杰瑞只有少数的家人住在他附近。只有他父亲和他住在同一个镇上。以前，他的许多姐妹都住在附近，但后来搬到了国家的不同地方。他想念他们，希望他们能待得更近一些。
